text: Mr Alex kindly agreed to help my daughter, who was really struggling with Chem and helped her to catch up quickly. He gives clear and concise explanations. He made it easy for her to understand difficult topics. He is a hardworking teacher and gives his all in teaching. Mr Alex also shows care and concern for his students.

Mr Alex is one of the best chemistry teachers I have ever had. He is very well versed with the IB syllabus and will tell you exactly where you went wrong and how you need to improve. Mr Alex is a very dedicated teacher who always wants his students to succeed. I enjoyed all my classes with him thoroughly.

Mr Alex,
Thank you for your incredible support and dedication in guiding my daughter through her A-level Chemistry journey. Your patience, expertise, and encouragement have guided her learning and confidence. We are deeply grateful for all the effort you’ve put in to help her succeed. Thank you very much.
Felicia
Steffi’s mum

Jes is a very experienced best teacher. And she is friendly, hardworking. My daughter said her maths class is interesting and she doesn't want to sleep. Thanks a lot for Jes teaching S4 Math at very important times. Helping my daughter got A two from B three.

Alex Toh is an excellent Chemistry teacher. He can help grasp the key points and teach everything my daughter doesn't understand. At first she worried about Science failure. In the end she got A One at O Level exam.

Jes and Alex are No.1 tuition teachers among all the tutors I know. Highly recommended.

Mr Toh is a truly caring and effective tutor. He not only coached my child from a Fail in lower secondary to Distinction for O levels, he also worked on encouraging her and building up her self confidence. He had so much belief in my daughter's abilities and that spurred her on to work towards that Distinction. That mattered a lot to us.

Thank you, Mr Toh!
